tool.name: g:Profiler / g:SNPense
tool.description: maps SNP rs-codes to gene names, chromosomal coordinates and variant effects

param.name: input
param.label: Input is whitespace-separated list of SNP IDs to be translated (should start with prefix ’rs’).

param.name: filter_na
param.label: Filter N/A
param.help: Whether to filter out results without a corresponding target name.

tool.help:
**What it does** Interface to the g:Profiler tool g:SNPense that maps SNP rs identifiers to chromosome positions, genes and variant effects. Available only for human SNPs.
----
**Useful links** * https://biit.cs.ut.ee/gprofiler/snpense — a standalone tool with expanded functionality.
----
**gprofiler2 R tool** * https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=gprofiler2 — as CRAN package. * https://anaconda.org/conda-forge/r-gprofiler2 — as conda-forge package.
